analysis.description:
LasVegas.Payout (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#123-137) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- PotOwner.transfer(pay) (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#127-128)

LasVegas.DoDev (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#206-211) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(dval) (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol)

LasVegas.Buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#137-204) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- TimeFinish == 0
	- TimeFinish == 1

LasVegas.Payout (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#123-137) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(TimeFinish > 1) (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#125-126)
	- require(bool)(TimeFinish < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#124-125)

LasVegas.Buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#137-204) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- TimeFinish < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#157-204)
	- TimeFinish == 0 (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#141-151)
	- TimeLeft < TimerStartTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#189-193)
	- TimeFinish == 1 (/unique_chucks/5/0x9492e713775d54e9cc1c89a9703c470af41ebab8.sol#146-151)
